overview: Once again, Edwin Lee and his friends are hanging out with ridiculously hot girls at an upscale Malibu Hostel for the weekend! Why? Because you know outrageous and crazy things are going to happen! Where else can you capture adult's finest fornicators partying it up in bikinis, getting crazy and having sex?! Check in to Lust Resort today for the ultimate spring break free-for-all!
title: The Lust Resort
